page.title: 03School Of Lawn Tennis
page.content: It began in 1961 with 4 grass courts. The head coach has studied tennis coaching all over the world and trains the coachs at the school.It is said to be the most popular school in Europe and the best.It now has 8 hard courts.On average 25,000 people play on the courts every year.There are individual and group coaching lessons.Its coachs will pick you up anywhere in the U.K. or abroad.The advanced players can have aids such as electric ball machines.The school also has training squads for brilliant tennis players from 7 years old.There is a shop which sells sport equipment.There is also a snack bar open from 10am to 6pm.The office is open all year round exept Christmas Day and Boxing Day.It is open from 9.30am to 6.30pm Monday to Saturday and 10am to 6.30pm on Sunday.
